title: NPFL : Rangers to hold trophy presentation Monday
body_text:
Sport
NPFL: Rangers to hold trophy presentation Monday
Rangers have confirmed that the presentation of their Nigeria Premier Football League, NPFL, trophy will take place on Monday, June 24.
The trophy presentation will hold at the Okpara Square by 4pm.
The Flying Antelopes will take on Gombe United in their final match of the season on Sunday (today).
Rangers had earlier announced that they will fly the squad alongside the trophy back to Enugu immediately after the game.
The Fidelis Ilechukwu side secured their eighth NPFL following a 2-0 win over Bendel Insurance last weekend
Rangers will represent Nigeria in the CAF Champions League next season.
